summary.para: Notifies the application that the key has been added.

remarks.para: KeyAdded can also be called if the keys requested for the session have already been acquired.

summary.para: Notifies the application that an error occurred while processing the key.
Passes information to the application so it can initiate a key acquisition.

param.name: destinationURL
param.para: The URL to send the message to.

param.name: message
param.para: The message to send to the application.

param.name: cb
param.para: The length in bytes of message.

summary.para: Provides a mechanism for notifying the app about information regarding the media key session.
